product.title: Buffalo Pennant Chenille Patch
product.description: What's more Buffalo than a pennant? Well, lot's of things, but we're trying to make pennants a thing. You get it. Get your Buffalo Pennant Chenille Patch for a two for one deal - show your Buffalo AND Oxford Pennant pride. Size: 4.5" x 2.5" Color: Blue, gold, and black
product.descriptionHtml:
What's more Buffalo than a pennant? Well, lot's of things, but we're trying to make pennants a thing. You get it. Get your Buffalo Pennant Chenille Patch for a two for one deal - show your Buffalo AND Oxford Pennant pride. 

Size: 4.5" x 2.5"

Color: Blue, gold, and black
